EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us for an Autopilot Webinar April 23 at 8 p.m. EST
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]>
<[[http://www.socialflight.com/#reg]]>
Join Andrew Barker, President from TruTrak and Jeff Simon from SocialFlight as they discuss how an autopilot can be one of the greatest safety tools available to pilots if used correctly. Understanding how and when to best use your autopilot can be the difference between it being a valuable safety tool vs. a dangerous distraction. Learn about the features and functions in the latest autopilots from industry leaders BendixKing and TruTrak, how to integrate them into your flying and what to look for in your next avionics upgrade. Topics Include:
- Introductions - A summary of autopilots (1/2/3-axis) - Emergency Level - When to use an autopilot (i.e. – not just after rotation…) - Workload Reduction Strategies - New autopilots from BendixKing
Webinar: Enhancing Safety Through Autopilot Proficiency Date: Tuesday, April 23, 8 p.m. EST
